definitions.text: a group of seven bright stars in the constellation Ursa Major
a farm tool having one or more heavy blades to break the soil and cut a furrow prior to sowing
move in a way resembling that of a plow cutting into or going through the soil
examples: The ship plowed through the water

definitions.text: to break and turn over earth especially with a plow
examples: Farmer Jones plowed his east field last week
turn the earth in the Spring
